course_title: Maternal Child Health Leadership Collaborative Seminar
class_notes: First Year Maternal and Child Health Certificate Student Only.  This course will meet one Saturday and Sunday during the semester.  Dates will be posted once confirmed.
course_description:
As a cross-institutional course lead by faculty from RSPH and Georgia State University, the Leadership Collaborative Seminar will provide a tailored interdisciplinary forum focused on building the necessary attitudes and relationships to prepare the next generation of health leaders to provide and promote coordinated, comprehensive, culturally competent care, programs, and policies for diverse MCH populations. MCH Certificate students only.
.
prerequisites: MCH Certificate students onlyMCH Certificate Students Only.
